attributes.action: raise the issue of when work will begin on the Bering Strait tunnel project with his Russian and US counterparts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition calls upon the Prime Minister to raise the issue of  when work will finally begin on the proposed Bering Strait bridge linking Europe, Asia and North America. Although the project would link Russia and the United States, it is an international infrastructure project that could have enormous economic benefits for Europe, Asia and North America. The UK Prime Minister could help the project begin by raising the issue with his Russian and American counterparts.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the US and Russian governments.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
